name: Bench Press (Barbell)
description: Compound exercise lying on a flat bench, pushing a barbell from chest to full arm extension.

name: Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell)
description: Bench press variation on an inclined bench using dumbbells, targeting upper chest.

name: Incline Bench Press (Barbell)
description: Bench press variation on an inclined bench using a barbell, targeting upper chest.

name: Incline Bench Press (Smith Machine)
description: Guided incline press using Smith machine, targeting upper chest.

name: Decline Bench Press (Machine)
description: Machine press from a declined position, targeting lower chest.

name: Pec Deck (Machine)
description: Isolation exercise bringing arms together in an arc motion.

name: Chest Dips
description: Bodyweight exercise lowering and raising body between parallel bars.

name: Cable Fly Crossover
description: Standing chest fly bringing cable handles together in front.

name: Squat (Barbell)
description: Compound exercise bending knees and hips with barbell on upper back.

name: Single Leg Squat
description: Squat performed on one leg, can be weighted or assisted.

name: Single Leg Extension
description: Unilateral knee extension exercise targeting one quad at a time.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
description: Isolation exercise extending knees against resistance.

name: Leg Press (Machine)
description: Pushing weight away using legs while seated.

name: Deadlift (Dumbbell)
description: Hip-hinge movement lifting dumbbells from floor.

name: Deadlift (Barbell)
description: Hip-hinge movement lifting barbell from floor.

name: Seated Leg Curl (Machine)
description: Isolation exercise curling legs from seated position.

name: Single Leg Seated Curl
description: Unilateral seated leg curl targeting one hamstring.

name: Hip Adduction (Machine)
description: Machine exercise bringing thighs together.

name: Hip Abduction (Machine)
description: Machine exercise spreading thighs apart.

name: Pull Ups
description: Bodyweight exercise pulling chin over bar from hang.

name: Lat Pulldown (Machine)
description: Pulling bar down to upper chest while seated.

name: Rear Delt Fly (Machine)
description: Isolation exercise targeting rear shoulder muscles.

name: Cable Low Row
description: Seated row using low cable attachment.

name: Seated Row (Machine)
description: Machine-guided horizontal pulling movement.

name: Single Arm Cross Body Pulldown
description: Unilateral diagonal pulldown movement.

name: Lat Pullover
description: Arc motion exercise targeting lat spread.

name: Bicep Curl (EZ Bar)
description: Standing curl using curved EZ bar.

name: Hammer Curl
description: Bicep curl with neutral grip using dumbbells.

name: Incline Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Bicep curl performed on an incline bench.

name: Cable Curl
description: Standing bicep curl using cable machine.

name: Rope Cable Curl
description: Bicep curl using rope attachment.

name: Close Grip Bench Press
description: Narrow grip bench press targeting triceps.

name: Tricep Pushdown
description: Standing tricep extension using cable machine.

name: Single Arm Tricep Pushdown
description: Unilateral tricep pushdown.

name: Cable Overhead Extension
description: Overhead tricep extension using cable.

name: Military Press
description: Overhead press targeting shoulders.

name: Lateral Raise (Dumbbell)
description: Side shoulder raise with dumbbells.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
description: Side shoulder raise using cable.

name: Face Pull
description: Pull toward face targeting rear delts and rotator cuff.

name: Back Extension
description: Extension exercise targeting lower back muscles.

name: Leg Raise
description: Raising legs while hanging or lying to target abs.
